entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
